power.title: Arc Lightning
power.fluff: Lightning leaps from your outstretched hand, weaving safely through your allies to bounce between your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature, or two creatures within 5 squares of each other
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Sustain Standard:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.
If the targets are within 5 squares of each other, each takes 1d6 + Intelligence modifier + Constitution modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier + Constitution modifier lightning damage.
If the targets are more than 5 squares away from each other, you pull each target towards the other a number of squares equal to one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum 1).
